data.title: Joyalukkas Jewellery in Kallang
data.meta_description: Joyalukkas Jewellery is a renowned chain of jewellery shops in Kallang, celebrated for providing quality products at the most competitive prices. Their collection features stunning handcrafted piec...
data.text:
Joyalukkas store always provides excellent service. Staff always help to choose the best ones .My daughter don't like much jewellery but once she came Joyalukkas Madam Roopa help us . Now we buy only from Madam Roopa and it's brings us more prosperity. Thank you Madam Roopa and team.

I had a great experience shopping for gold jewelry at this store. I want to express my appreciation to the manager Roopa and the attentive staff Rubina who assisted us. They provided excellent service and made our visit enjoyable. The selection of gold jewelry was impressive, and I found the perfect piece. I highly recommend this store for anyone looking for quality gold jewelry and outstanding customer service.

Had a great experience shopping for my gold jewellery. Staff Vijayalakshmi was super patient and helpful while I chose the necklace. She was also suggesting relevant combination of earrings to go with my necklace. Thank you!!
